name: Freewaters Supreem Sport Print Sandals - Unisex
description:
Strappy sandals that convert to slides in a moment. Plush Supreem foam footbeds have an ergonomic heel cup and built in arch support, making long days of exploring a lot more comfortable.Supreem Foam is 10-15% recycled materials and offers comfort and plenty of rebound.Grippy rubber tread.Dyed with e.dye® Waterless Colour System™ that uses 75% less water, fewer chemicals and reduced CO2 emissions than traditional dyeing methods.PVC-free construction uses water based adhesives offering a safer alternative to commonly used solvent-based adhesives.Every pair of Freewaters sold helps support global water initiatives, helping provide safe, clean drinking water for all.Since their 2011 launch Freewaters has 85 clean water projects around the globe.

        Sustainability
